articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: Google’s Pixel 9 Pro Fold Will Turn Into A $1,799 Nightmare If You Bend It In The Wrong Direction, Reveals Latest Durability Test - Wccftech
articles.description: A YouTuber performed a durability test on Google’s expensive Pixel 9 Pro Fold, concluding that it is just as delicate as its predecessor
articles.content: The Pixel 9 Pro Fold is marketed as the worlds thinnest and most durable foldable smartphone by Google in some regions, with a design that is drastically different from the first-generation Pixel Fol… [+2090 chars]
